channel.title: CVE Feed for Google LLC -- Google Play Services SDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google LLC -- Google Play Services SDK

item.title: CVE-2022-1799|2024-08-03T00:17:00.354Z -- google%20llc -- google%20play%20services%20sdk
item.description: Incorrect signature trust exists within Google Play services SDK play-services-basement. A debug version of Google Play services is trusted by the SDK for devices that are non-GMS. We recommend upgrading the SDK past the 2022-05-03 release.
